keys: diagrama de la transferencia de energía

          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a television set transfers electricity into heat, light and sound.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">energy transfer diagram</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">television set</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein Fernseher 
Elektrizität in Hitze, in Licht und in Ton überträgt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un téléviseur 
transfère l'électricité dans la chaleur, la lumière et le bruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um jogo de 
televisão transfere a eletricidade no calor, na luz e no som.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che un televisore 
trasferisce l'elettricità in calore, in luce e nel suono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα τηλεοπτικό σύνολο
μεταφέρει την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια στη θερμότητα, το φως και τον 
ήχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una televisión 
transfiere electricidad en calor, luz y sonido.</string>
          </description>
